# Binary to Hexadecimal BitMaP display driver (Logisim PLA)
0xxxx 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 # DISABLE
10000 011111110100000001100010001100000001011111110 # 0
10001 000000000000000000111111111010000000000000000 # 1
10010 011000001100100001100010001100001101010000011 # 2
10011 011101110100010001100010001100010001010000010 # 3
10100 011111111000001000000001000111001000000111000 # 4
10101 100011110100010001100010001100010001111110010 # 5
10110 010001110100010001100010001100010001011111110 # 6
10111 111000000100110000100001111100000000100000000 # 7
11000 011101110100010001100010001100010001011101110 # 8
11001 011111110100010001100010001100010001011100010 # 9
11010 011111111100010000100010000100010000011111111 # A
11011 011101110100010001100010001100010001111111111 # B
11100 010000010100000001100000001100000001011111110 # C
11101 011111110100000001100000001100000001111111111 # D
11110 100000001100010001100010001100010001111111111 # E
11111 100000000100010000100010000100010000111111111 # F
